subject: Automobile Racing
Automobiles
Engineering and Engineers
lead_paragraph: For Patrick Head, engineering director of the Williams team, which he co-founded in 1977 with Frank Williams, the thrill of Formula One technology is still not gone after all of these years.
snippet: For Patrick Head, engineering director of the Williams team, which he co-founded in 1977 with Frank Williams, the thrill of Formula One technology is still not gone after all of these years.
